============================================
core/subroutines/parenthesis
============================================

function void foo();
    init();
endfunction

----

(source_file
  (function_declaration
    (function_body_declaration
      (data_type_or_void)
      name: (simple_identifier)
      (function_statement_or_null
        (function_statement
          (statement
            (statement_item
              (subroutine_call_statement
                (subroutine_call
                  (tf_call
                    (hierarchical_identifier
                      (simple_identifier))))))))))))
